# V1 Vertical Slice Plan (Template)

Target slice: Auth -> Create/Join Family Group -> Preferences -> Suggestions.

## Milestones
1) Repo + CI + IaC scaffold
2) Auth working end-to-end
3) Group create/join
4) Preferences + watched history (minimal)
5) Suggestions (v1 algorithm) + UI

## Definition of Done (per task)
- Code merged to main via PR
- Tests added/updated
- Runbook updated if needed
- No secrets committed
